nodes.name: Open Browser
nodes.description: Launches a new browser instance with configurable options including browser type, proxy settings, extensions, download directories, and window modes. Returns a browser ID for use with other browser nodes.

optBrowser.title: Browser
optBrowser.description: Select the browser type to launch.

optMaximized.title: Maximized
optMaximized.description: Start the browser window in maximized mode, taking up the full screen area.

optFullScreen.title: Fullscreen
optFullScreen.description: Start the browser in fullscreen mode without window borders or title bars.

optProxy.title: Proxy Settings
optProxy.description: Configure proxy settings for the browser. Use Manual Proxy for custom proxy servers or Robomotion Proxy for built-in gateway proxy.

optProxyAddr.title: Proxy Address
optProxyAddr.description: The proxy server address in format host:port (e.g., 192.168.1.100:8080). Required when Manual Proxy is selected.

optProxyAuth.title: Proxy Authentication
optProxyAuth.description: Authentication method for the proxy server. Use Basic Authentication if your proxy requires username and password.

optProxyCredentials.title: Proxy Credentials
optProxyCredentials.description: Username and password for proxy authentication. Required when Basic Authentication is selected.

optUserDataDir.title: User Data Dir
optUserDataDir.description: If given, browser uses this directory for user data, if it is empty a temporary directory is created. Each browser session requires a unique directory and cannot share the same path.

optDownloadDir.title: Download Dir
optDownloadDir.description: If given, browser uses this directory for downloads, if its empty uses default download directory (Chrome only)

optBrowserOptions.title: Browser Options
optBrowserOptions.description: Browser configuration object containing advanced options and settings. Example: {'window-size': '1920,1080', 'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36', 'disable-images': true}

optCustomBrowserOptions.title: Custom Browser Options
optCustomBrowserOptions.description: Individual browser command-line arguments added dynamically. Each argument is entered in a separate field with key=value format without quotes (e.g., 'window-size=1920,1080', 'disable-images').

optExtensions.title: Extensions
optExtensions.description: Array of Chrome extension file paths or Chrome Web Store URLs to load into the browser. Only works with Chrome browsers.

optCustomExtensions.title: Custom Extensions
optCustomExtensions.description: List of Chrome extension file paths (.crx files) or Chrome Web Store URLs to install. Enter one extension path per field.

nodes.name: Close Browser
nodes.description: Terminates a browser instance and closes all its windows and tabs. Cleans up browser resources and removes temporary directories created during browser session.

inBrowserId.title: Browser Id
inBrowserId.description: The unique identifier of the browser instance to close. This should be the browser ID output from the Open Browser node.

nodes.name: Open Link
nodes.description: Navigates to a specified URL in a browser. Can open in a new tab or reuse an existing tab, with options for blocking images/CSS and stealth mode for bot detection avoidance.

inBrowserId.title: Browser
inBrowserId.description: The browser instance identifier where the new page will be opened.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: Optional page identifier. If provided and 'Open in the Same Tab' is enabled, the URL will be opened in this existing page instead of creating a new tab.

inUrl.title: URL
inUrl.description: The web address to navigate to (e.g., 'https://example.com'). Protocol will be automatically added if not specified.

outPageId.title: Page Id
outPageId.description: The unique identifier of the newly opened page. Use this ID to interact with the page in subsequent browser nodes.

optSameTab.title: Open in the Same Tab
optSameTab.description: If enabled and a Page Id is provided, opens the URL in the existing tab instead of creating a new tab.

optTimeout.title: Timeout
optTimeout.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for the page to load before timing out (default: 30 seconds).

optBlockImages.title: Block Images
optBlockImages.description: Prevent loading of images (jpg, jpeg, png, gif, svg, webp) to improve page load speed and reduce bandwidth usage.

optBlockCSS.title: Block CSS
optBlockCSS.description: Prevent loading of CSS stylesheets to improve page load speed. Note: this may affect page layout and appearance.

optStealthMode.title: Use Stealth Mode
optStealthMode.description: Enable stealth mode to make the browser less detectable as an automated browser by websites with anti-bot measures.

nodes.name: Switch Window
nodes.description: Switches browser focus between different windows or tabs. Can switch to next available window or find a window by matching its title using regular expressions.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier of the current browser window to switch from.

inWindowName.title: Window Title
inWindowName.description: Regular expression pattern to match the window title. Use .* to match any characters or specific text to match exact titles.

optNextWindow.title: Next Window
optNextWindow.description: If enabled, switches to the next available window instead of searching by window title. Ignores the Window Title field when enabled.

nodes.name: Close Window
nodes.description: Closes the active browser window or tab and automatically switches focus to another available window. Useful for cleaning up tabs after completing tasks.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier of the browser window to close.

nodes.name: Send Keys
nodes.description: Sends keyboard key combinations to a specific element. Supports special keys (Enter, Tab, F1-F12) and modifier keys (Ctrl, Alt, Shift) for keyboard shortcuts and navigation.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the element to send keys to is located.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the target element on the page (e.g., '//input[@name="username"]' or '#username').

inKey.title: Key
inKey.description: Single character to send to the element, combined with the selected modifier keys (e.g., 'a', '1', or leave empty to send only modifier keys).

nodes.name: Upload File
nodes.description: Uploads a file to a web form by interacting with file input elements. Validates file existence before upload and waits for the upload element to be available.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the file upload element is located.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the file input element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the file input element (e.g., '//input[@type="file"]' or 'input[type="file"]').

inFilePath.title: File Path
inFilePath.description: The absolute path to the file to upload (e.g., 'C:\Documents\file.pdf' or '/home/user/documents/file.pdf').

nodes.name: Type Text
nodes.description: Types text into input fields with options for human-like typing simulation. Can clear existing text, control typing speed, and automatically press Enter after typing.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the text input element is located.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the text input element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the text input element (e.g., '//input[@name="username"]' or '#username').

inText.title: Text
inText.description: The text to type into the selected element. Can be any string value including passwords, URLs, or form data.

optWaitTimeout.title: Wait Timeout (sec)
optWaitTimeout.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for the text input element to become available before timing out (default: 5 seconds).

optKeysPerMinute.title: Keys per Minute
optKeysPerMinute.description: Typing speed when Simulate Human Typing is enabled. Lower values type slower, higher values type faster (default: 300 keys/minute).

optEnter.title: Press Enter
optEnter.description: Automatically press the Enter key after typing the text, useful for submitting forms or confirming input.

optClearText.title: Clear Before Typing
optClearText.description: Clear any existing text in the input field before typing the new text. Ensures the field contains only the new text.

optSimulateHuman.title: Simulate Human Typing
optSimulateHuman.description: Type text with realistic human-like timing and variations to avoid detection by anti-bot systems. Uses the Keys per Minute setting.

nodes.name: Move To Element
nodes.description: Moves the mouse cursor to hover over a specified element. Useful for triggering hover effects, tooltips, or dropdown menus that appear on mouse hover.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the element to move mouse cursor to is located.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the element to move mouse cursor to (e.g., '//div[@class="menu"]' or '.menu').

optWaitTimeout.title: Wait Timeout (sec)
optWaitTimeout.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for the element to become available for mouse movement before timing out (default: 5 seconds).

nodes.name: Alert
nodes.description: Handles browser alert dialogs, confirmation prompts, and popup messages. Can accept, dismiss, or retrieve text from JavaScript alerts and confirm dialogs.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the alert dialog is displayed.

outText.title: Text
outText.description: The text content of the alert dialog when using 'Get Text' action.

optAction.title: Action
optAction.description: Action to perform on the alert dialog: 'Confirm' accepts the alert, 'Cancel' dismisses it, 'Get Text' retrieves the alert message.

nodes.name: Save Image
nodes.description: Downloads and saves images from web pages to local disk. Supports both base64 encoded images and images from URLs, extracting from the src attribute of image elements.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the image element is located.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the image element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the image element to save (e.g., '//img[@alt="logo"]' or 'img.logo').

inSaveFilePath.title: Save File Path
inSaveFilePath.description: The file path where the image will be saved (e.g., 'C:\\images\\logo.png'). The file extension determines the format.

optWaitTimeout.title: Wait Timeout (sec)
optWaitTimeout.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for the image element to become available before timing out (default: 5 seconds).

nodes.name: Click Element
nodes.description: Performs various mouse click actions on web elements. Supports single click, double click, right click, middle click, and hold/release operations for complex interactions.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the element to click is located.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the element to click (e.g., '//button[@id="submit"]' or '#submit').

optWaitTimeout.title: Wait Timeout (sec)
optWaitTimeout.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for the element to become clickable before timing out (default: 5 seconds).

optClickType.title: Click Type
optClickType.description: Type of mouse click to perform: Single (normal click), Double (double-click), Hold (press and hold), Release (release held click), Middle (scroll wheel click), Right (context menu click).

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the element to wait for is located.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the element to wait for (e.g., '//div[@class="loading"]' or '.loading').

optCondition.title: Condition
optCondition.description: Wait condition: 'To Appear' waits for element to become visible, 'To Disappear' waits for element to be removed, 'Appear & Disappear' waits for element to appear then disappear.

optTimeout.title: Timeout (sec)
optTimeout.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for the condition to be met before timing out and failing the node (default: 30 seconds).

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the dropdown element is located.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the dropdown element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the dropdown element (e.g., '//select[@name="country"]' or 'select[name="country"]').

inValue.title: Value
inValue.description: The value or text of the option to select from the dropdown. Can be the option value attribute or visible text.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier from which to retrieve cookies.

outCookies.title: Cookies
outCookies.description: Array of cookie objects containing name, value, domain, path, and other cookie properties from the current page.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the cookies will be set.

inCookies.title: Cookies
inCookies.description: JSON array of cookie objects to set. Each cookie should have 'name' and 'value' properties. Optional properties: 'domain', 'path', 'expires', 'maxAge', 'secure', 'httpOnly', 'sameSite'. Example: [{'name': 'sessionID', 'value': '12345', 'domain': 'example.com'}]

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the element to get value from is located.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the element from which to retrieve the attribute value (e.g., '//input[@name="email"]' or '#email').

inAttribute.title: Attribute
inAttribute.description: The attribute name to retrieve from the element. Common attributes: 'value', 'innerText', 'innerHTML', 'href', 'src', 'alt', 'title', 'class', 'id'.

outValue.title: Value
outValue.description: The retrieved attribute value from the selected element.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the element to set value on is located.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the element to set the value on (e.g., '//input[@name="quantity"]' or '#quantity').

inValue.title: Value
inValue.description: The value to set on the element. This directly sets the element's value property without simulating user typing.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the iframe element to switch to (e.g., '//iframe[@name="content"]' or 'iframe[name="content"]').

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the iframe element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier containing the iframe to switch to.

inRootFrame.title: Switch To Root
inRootFrame.description: If enabled, switches to the main document frame (root). If disabled, switches to the frame specified by the selector.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier to navigate back in its browser history.

inTimes.title: Times
inTimes.description: Number of steps to go back in the browser history (default: 1).

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier to navigate forward in its browser history.

inTimes.title: Times
inTimes.description: Number of steps to go forward in the browser history (default: 1).

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier of the browser page to refresh.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier to take a screenshot of.

inSaveFilePath.title: Save File Path
inSaveFilePath.description: The file path where the screenshot will be saved (e.g., 'C:\screenshots\page.png'). Supports PNG format.

func.title: Script
func.description: JavaScript code to execute in the browser context. The script has access to the DOM and can return values. Use 'return' statement to output results.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the JavaScript code will be executed.

outResult.title: Result
outResult.description: The return value from the executed JavaScript code, converted to string format.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the table element to scrape (e.g., '//table[@id="data"]' or 'table.data-table').

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the table element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the table to scrape is located.

outTable.title: Table
outTable.description: The extracted table data as a structured object with rows and columns.

optVertical.title: Vertical
optVertical.description: If enabled, treats the table as having vertical headers (first column contains headers). If disabled, treats first row as headers.

optExcludedColumns.title: Excluded Columns
optExcludedColumns.description: Array of column names or indices to exclude from the extracted table data.

optCustomExcludedColumns.title: Custom Excluded Columns
optCustomExcludedColumns.description: List of column names to exclude from the table extraction. Enter one column name per field.

inSelector.title: Selector
inSelector.description: The XPath or CSS selector to locate the list container element on the page.

inSelectorType.title: Selector Type
inSelectorType.description: Choose how to locate the list element: XPath uses XML path expressions, CSS uses CSS selectors.

inPageId.title: Page Id
inPageId.description: The page identifier where the list element is located.

outTable.title: Table
outTable.description: The extracted list data as a structured object with rows and columns based on the defined list items.

optListItems.title: List Items
optListItems.description: Array defining which data to extract from each list item. Each item should specify name, selector, and optional attribute.
